content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.5, -49.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.5, -49.5) and a furnace at position (-18.5, -48.5).

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (x1) and inserter at position (a) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position (y1) to the assembling machine at position (z1).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing entities
- Ensure that necessary entities, such as stone furnaces, are placed on the map before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors related to power connections
- Check that all power-consuming entities are properly connected to a power network to avoid issues like "not connected to power network" or "no power."
